channel.title: Project Apolo
channel.description:
Project Apolo Is a project That I've begun working on. When I'm finished It will be one of the most stable Base's You've ever seen. I'm not using a base, what-so-ever. This source is going to be coded completely from scratch. I just finished 2 year's of computer economics's and java class's. I really want to put that too that test.
When I'm Finished the server base will be very stable, and completely open source.
[center]SERVER WILL NOT HAVE
NPC'S Global Objects Skills Quest's Combats ::pickup Enabled Pk Prayer ECT.[/center]
This is going to be a fresh base for you too work from. I'm tired of all the deltascape source's that have the autospawn.cfg Information deleted, and global object's from the client.java, and some from texthandler deleted.. Then call It a blank source. ITS NOT.
My goal:
My goal is too make the server size UNDER 250kb for all the file's combined.
The server currently has:
Logging In Character Changing Weapon Weilding Bank Interface
Wish me luck :] I may post screenie's soon.
Project Apolo may be released some-time soon.

item.title: Project Apolo
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:

WDF! no pking, prayer, quests, combat???
!
W
! W D F !
F
!
[/quote]

here kiddies, the examine this fine specimen of leecher but dont get to close, he might leech your smarts

Kids: hahahahahahah

your right, he couldn’t do that… HES AND IDIOT.

well good luck bro if your not lying I hope you can finish.[/quote]
Nah, Gh0st Jr is pretty ownage.

On Topic - Good luck with this. Hope to see the outcome.
